text_block_list.text: One day while training, Silence Suzuka seemed to be running in good form but-

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Haa… haa… haa… haa…!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Fuu- an improvement of 0.1 second. Seems like there's no issue with running… haa…
choice_data_list: Was there a problem with the training…?
Was there a problem with the training…?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ah, no. There's no issue with the training.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …It's just that, this weekend, there's a Fan Meetup event.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: But, I've been so preoccupied with running that…I haven't really gotten used to that kind of thing.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: And last time, when a fan spoke to me, I was so worried thinking of a response that I unconsciously started pacing in a circle…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: After that, there was an article in a magazine titled "When I called out to her, she mysteriously started walking in a counterclockwise circle"…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Because of that, whenever I hear about a "Meetup Event" I feel a little dejected… it'd be nice if I didn't mess up like that again.
choice_data_list: Maybe you were a little overwhelmed

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I suppose that could have been the case…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: However, that's exactly why I'd like to conduct the event properly. I say that, but, I don't feel like I can…
choice_data_list: Want to try practicing with me?
Want to try practicing with me?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Eh… practice, is it? With Trainer-san…?
And with that, I volunteered to act as a Fan to help Silence Suzuka practice.
choice_data_list:
I've become an even bigger admirer now 
because of your wonderful running!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ah… you're starting with an unexpectedly higher difficulty subject.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Um… I should honestly accept the praise of "Wonderful Running"…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: "-bigger admirer now" means, in short, up until now they've admired me, too… uuuu~n…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …Thank you very much.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …Um, that's all.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: You don't need to follow up like that. Even if we practice now, it'd be just a drop in the bucket.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Unlike Fukikitaru and her fortunes or Taiki who can talk about anything, I guess I'm not suited to holding lively conversations.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: That said… at the very least, I feel like I should do the event with a brighter outlook…
choice_data_list: Then should I prepare a reward?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: A reward…?
And then the weekend, the day of the Meetup event that worried Silence Suzuka approached.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Fuuua… the tension in the air is a bit different from a race, isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Honestly, I'm still a little uneasy but…Yeah. I'll stay positive and give it my best.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yes. I'll be off…I'll be looking forward to my reward.

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Fan
text_block_list.text: Suzuka-san, I always cheer for you! Lately when I see you run, it seems like you've got this air of 'completeness' about you!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Um, Thank you very much. And… um… mmmm…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ah! Paying attention to such a small detail, I'm honored.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: And, mmmmm… mmmm…
Having seen Silence Suzuka trying her best with the event, I went to prepare her reward-

text_block_list.name: Store Staff
text_block_list.text: The end of the line for a "Royal Honey Carrot Tart" is over heeeere! The wait will be at least 140 minutes!
There was a famous sweets shop in this part of the mall and I queued up in the long line. Then-

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: 4 hours… you stood in line for that long?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I see, part of making a Tart is to bake and let it cool. That must be why it takes so long…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Um, I'm sorry. When you suddenly talked about a reward, this was the first thing I thought of since it was a hot topic in class…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: But, because of that, the event went really well.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ah… this doesn't mean I've become better at interacting with people. It's just…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yes, that's right. At the very least, more so than before.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Before, I was worried about how to behave or what I should do. I thought about alot of things but…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Focusing on that "reward" made things simple. I just have to do my best, I thought.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Just like in a race, focusing only on the goal… thinking like that made it possible.
choice_data_list: You worked hard, so the sweets will be delicious

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Fufuu, I'm looking forward to how good they'll be.
Silence Suzuka said that with a soft expression on her face, full of the satisfaction of completing the event.
